name: Oh Crab! (Wellwick)
description:
Fight against the evil Seahorses with your clam-gun

Controls are traditional WASD, with Space to Jump. 
Click to fire your clam-gun.
Double tap A or D to dash to the side!

Music and Sounds by misunra (aka Jesterday)
Programming (mostly) by Wellwick

Assets used: 
Crab - https://poly.google.com/view/2DgM36qZW2u
Seahorse - https://poly.google.com/view/d_36p3CahYa
